Evocation 8

Maelstrom
Ritual
W6
spell id [id]: 580
effect number [effect_number]: 81
damage [damage]: 47
spec [spec]: 41943040
number of effects [nreff]: 1
gems required [gemcost]: 80W
Enchant Battlefield | Enchant World:Maelstrom
 
(May Use Underwater [uwok], Use Underwater Only [uwonly])
A huge magical maelstrom is created in a sea. The maelstrom constantly sucks in huge amounts of water and filters out its magical essence. This results in a huge amount of magic gems for the caster.
Grants 15 Water, 5 astral, 3 air and 1 of each other gem type each month.
